key_deliverables: User Reg/Login; Salla OAuth Flow; Token Encryption
demo_objectives: Register new user; Connect Salla store; Verify token storage
success_criteria: User can authenticate; Salla tokens stored encrypted; Refresh logic working
risk_factors: Salla API availability; Security vulnerabilities in Auth
mitigation_strategies: Mock Salla API for dev; Security audit of JWT logic

key_deliverables: CDC Consumer; ETL Transformer; Dashboard APIs
demo_objectives: Create order in mock Salla; See aggregated stat update in <5 mins
mitigation_strategies: Buffering optimization; Strong typing in ETL

key_deliverables: Vector Search; RAG Pipeline; Chat UI

success_criteria: AI queries adhere to tenant isolation; Correct SQL generated
